thread.section_title: Luxy Hair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luxy Hair | www.luxyhair.com
thread.title: Shannon White
thread.title_full: Luxy Hair reviewed by Shannon White

author: Shannon White
title: Shannon White
text: I'm a long time clip-in wearer. I've tried many of the brands on the market, including Cashmere, FoxyLox, the brands sold at stores like Sally Beauty, Bellami. I'm on my third set of Luxy Hair and I don't think I'll go back! They are the thickest and softest on the market. I wear mine almost daily and they can last up to a year. People are always shocked when they find out I'm an extension wearer! I love my Luxy Hair!!
